On Nov 6, 2007 8:48 PM, Hugh Winkler <hughw@...> wrote:
> I'm happy the way it is.
>
>
> On Nov 6, 2007 7:55 PM, Etan Wexler <yahoo.com@...> wrote:
> > An alternative to creating a new
> > mailing list is to admit that most of us, most of the time, are not
> > interested in discussing the Representational State Transfer per se.
> >

and... I am interested in discussing REST, but I also think it's a
good idea to discuss the realization of that architectural style in
the reference implementation, HTTP.

Hugh
